imdb.title: Surmount's Visions
plot: If it's the Power, Empire or Scandal you're looking for. You don't want to miss a minute of this. "Family is Everything"::Sue Page
synopsis: Things have been great in the lives of these 4 siblings who live in Detroit, MI. Well except when their parents passed away from a car accident that took both their parents away. Sue is the oldest and has built a multi-billion dollar conglomerate of businesses. Rob and Kross decide to ask for help in starting a multi-media company at the age of 20 and Sue told them if she did she would have to be a partner in the business. Without hesitation the brothers agree knowing that their business would be a success. Rob has a gift for seeing things that make him be even more creative in his choices when it comes to music and videos because he is an artist himself but has trust issue when it comes to women. Rob is a ladies man. Kross, is strictly into handling business and went to college and graduated with a Bachelors Degree in Business, married with 2 girls. Sue already had an Executive Protection Company and wanted to incorporate it within the entertainment part of the business and each other the siblings decided to join in on the action. Sev, the youngest and an inspiring rapper out of the bunch has always been spoiled by their parents and when they passed he went on a spiral of bad decisions making his sister throw her hands up and not allowing him to come to her. After talking to his sister Sue and was told that until he got his act together he couldn't and wouldn't get any help. Sev, enlisted his brothers to help him get on the right path so not to disappoint his sister. They told him in no uncertain terms would they be on her bad side and for him to do right or they would disown him also. Everyone knows that Sue is a no nonsense type of person when it comes to business and no one questions her ability when it comes to running a business. Sue won't allow anyone to come in and mess with her family which includes the employees who are working for both companies. The siblings are put to the test when a tour is about to come up and the Protection agency is asked to join in on the fun and even after the tour ends. Little do they know that things are about to take a turn in their lives as things become evident that there are evil forces at hand trying to knock them off their game. But when threatened Sue put everyone on alert and they prepare for all that comes at them.
